vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Potential SQL injection. Use parameterized queries instead of string formatting.
vulnerabilities.code_snippet: db.execute("UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + ? WHERE id = ?", (amount, to_account))

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Authentication
vulnerabilities.description: Critical function "delete" has no authentication. Add @login_required or similar decorator.

vulnerabilities.title: Unrestricted File Upload
vulnerabilities.description: File upload without type validation. Restrict file types to whitelist only.

vulnerabilities.title: Insufficient Random Values
vulnerabilities.description: Use random.choice()/randint() for cryptographic operations. Use secrets module instead.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data
vulnerabilities.description: Sensitive data stored without encryption. Encrypt at rest and in transit.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data
vulnerabilities.description: Sensitive data stored without encryption. Encrypt at rest and in transit.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
vulnerabilities.description: POST endpoint without CSRF protection. Implement CSRF tokens for state-changing operations.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
vulnerabilities.description: State-changing operation without CSRF protection. Implement CSRF tokens for state-changing operations.
vulnerabilities.code_snippet: db.execute("UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - ? WHERE id = ?", (amount, from_account))

vulnerabilities.title: Weak JWT Algorithm
vulnerabilities.description: Using weak JWT algorithm (HS256 or none). Use RS256 or stronger algorithms.

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Secret Key
vulnerabilities.description: Flask secret_key is hardcoded. This key is used for session signing.

vulnerabilities.title: Debug Mode Enabled
vulnerabilities.description: Flask debug mode enables the interactive debugger, allowing arbitrary code execution.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing HTTPS Configuration
vulnerabilities.description: Application runs without SSL/TLS configuration.

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection in Transfer Money Route
vulnerabilities.description: SQL Injection in Transfer Money Route
vulnerabilities.code_snippet:
app = Flask(__name__)
app.secret_key = "dev"  # Weak secret in production
